name: Advocacy
description: AICRC offers advocacy regarding the enforcement of the Indian Child Welfare Act so that Indian children can be fostered by Indian families.
fullDescription: AICRC offers advocacy regarding the enforcement of the Indian Child Welfare Act so that Indian children can be fostered by Indian families.
whatTheyOffer: AICRC offers advocacy regarding the enforcement of the Indian Child Welfare Act so that Indian children can be fostered by Indian families.
